meta_info.name: INTERVAL_EVENT
meta_info.description: Defines a single interval event in a series.

functions.name: interval_start_time
functions.meaning: Start time of the interval of this event.

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: Duration of the time interval during which the values recorded under `data` are true and, if set, the values recorded under `state` are true. Void if an instantaneous event.

attributes.name: sample_count
attributes.description: Optional count of original samples to which this event corresponds.

attributes.name: math_function
attributes.description: Mathematical function of the data of this event, e.g.  maximum, mean etc. Coded using https://github.com/openEHR/terminology/blob/master/openEHR_RM/en/openehr_terminology.xml[openEHR vocabulary `event math function`]. Default value `640|actual|`, meaning 'actual value'.
